**Example 1: 样例**



Input: 

```
tccli wedata DescribeDataSourceWithoutInfo --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --OrderFields.0.Direction xx \
    --OrderFields.0.Name xx \
    --Filters.0.Values xx \
    --Filters.0.Name xx
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "123",
        "Data": {}
    }
}
```
